Name: cheilitis
Definition: A lip disease characterized by the inflammation of the lips; which may include the perioral skin

Name: lip cancer
Definition: A multiple carboxylase deficiency that involves a deficiency in biotinidase.

Name: lip carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the lip.

Name: obsolete carcinoma in situ of digestive organ
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the digestive organ and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.
Synonym: carcinoma in situ of other and unspecified digestive organs (disorder)
